title: Gambia Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in Gambia increased 0.67 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in Gambia averaged 0.57 percent from 2011 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2.53 percent in April of 2022 and a record low of -0.70 percent in April of 2021. Inflation Rate MoM measures month over month change in the price of goods and services. This page provides - Gambia Inflation Rate MoM- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: GBoS - Gambia Bureau of Statistics
